data.text: Description Anmol Ghadi EALP 4065 Bollywood LP Vinyl Record Product Details Film Anmol Ghadi Star Cast Surendra, Suraiya, Noorjahan, Zahur Raja, Murad, Leela Mishra, Amir Banu, Bhudo Advani, Noor Mahal, Bibubai & Dewaskar Director Mehboob Khan Producer Mehboob Khan Music Naushad Lyrics Tanvir Naqvi & Anum Pilibhiti Releasing Year 1946 Type Original Soundtrack Language Hindi Label HMV SKU No. EALP 4065 Side One Jawan Hai Mohabbat Hasin Hai Zaman Noor Jehan Udhan Khatole Pe Ud Jaoon Zohra & Shamshad Begum Tera Khilauna Toota Mohd. Rafi Main Dil Men Dard Basa Lai Suraiya Kyun Yaad Aarahe Hain Surendra Mere Bachpan De Sathi Noor Jehan Side Two Aaja Meri Barbar Mohabbat Ke Sahare Noor Jehan Ab Kaun Hai Mera Surendra Awaz De Kahan Hai Noor Jehan & Surendra Man Leta Hai Angdai Suraiya Kya Mil Gaya Bhagwan Noor Jehan Socha Tha Kya Kya Ho Gaya Suraiya LP Specification Size 12 Inches Speed 33 RPM Record Condition Excellent Cover Condition Excellent
